oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Carter Smoke House
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Postcard showing the smoke house owned by the Carter family.
The smokehouse received bullet holes during Battle of Franklin in November 1864.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Carter family; Franklin, Battle of, Franklin, Tenn., 1864; Confederate States of America--History
Smokehouses
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tennessee State Library and Archives
